title: FS: SOLD T206 Christy Mathewson Portrait - SGC 30 SOLD
author: robw1959

posts.post_title: FS: SOLD T206 Christy Mathewson Portrait - SGC 30 SOLD
posts.post_content: T206 Portrait of Christy Mathewson, graded SGC 30. SOLD

Agreed!  Good looking '2'.  Perhaps just the edge chipping...otherwise would have thought it would get a higher number

Good luck w/ sale,
SGL

I've looked at it very closely, and don't see any edge chipping at all. Sorry about the somewhat blurry scans, but it's the best my scanner can do. There does appear to be a light stain along the right front border that may look like chipping.
